pageContext.claim: “Biden’s Handler’s want to expand the Court. This would be very bad for the USA. On top of that they don't want to provide a list of who would be chosen for the Court. MUST HAVE A LIST OF THESE RADICAL LEFT JUDGES!”
pageContext.analysis: Regardless of his advisors, Biden is the head of the Democratic party and he has not clearly said he was for or against court packing. Rather, he said that he would convene a commission to study reforms.
